column1: This article presents arguments for considering PAD a diagnosis: PAD is a prototypical example of a relational issue; the phenomenon of PAD is almost universally understood by mental_health professionals; PAD is a valid and reliable construct; adopting criteria for PAD will promote systematic research; adopting criteria will enhance the responsible use of the concept of PAD; and adopting criteria will improve the care of children with this issue.
